Reviews.Title: Nice Kit
Reviews.Author: Mtani M. Holiday "Lover of Peanut Butter"
Reviews.Content: The camera I bought runs through batteries.  I was very happy I bought a few extra batteries.  The kit is work it if you want to make sure you have extra accessories. I gave this four stars since the batteries seem to take a while to charge.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 2100 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
32GB SDHC Class 10 Secure Digital High Speed Memory Card
(See Description for MORE!)
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 2100 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit + 32GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Card + Deluxe Starter Kit + Memory Card Wallet + Multi Card USB Reader for Fujifilm FinePix SL1000 Digital Camera and Fujifilm NP-85
